meanings.definition: Crushes or squeezes something with force
meanings.sent1: She squashes the bug with her shoe.
meanings.sent2: He squashes the grapes to make juice.
meanings.sent3: The wrestler squashes his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent4: The heavy box squashes the delicate flowers.
meanings.sent5: The chef squashes the garlic to release its flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of vegetable with a soft flesh and hard skin
meanings.sent1: She bought some squashes from the market.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for diced squashes.
meanings.sent3: The squashes in the garden are growing well.
meanings.sent4: The farmer harvested the ripe squashes.
meanings.sent5: The colorful squashes brighten up the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A sport played with a racket and a ball on an enclosed court
meanings.sent2: He enjoys playing squashes with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The intense squashes match ended in a tie.
meanings.sent4: She won the squashes tournament last year.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the squashes ball echoes in the court.
